name: Poise Ultra Thin Incontinence Pads & Postpartum Pads for Bladder Leaks, 3 Drop Light Absorbency, Regular Length, 144 Count, Packaging May Vary
short_description: POISE ULTRA THIN INCONTINENCE PADS: 144 incontinence and postpartum bladder leak pads, 3 Drop Light Absorbency, regular length (144 pads total)
OUR THINNEST PROTECTION: Poise Ultra Thin Pads have a Thin-Flex design that holds its shape for all-day comfort​
DESIGNED TO KEEP YOU DRY: Our ultra thin incontinence pads have a Dry-Touch layer that rapidly locks away more* wetness for a clean feel (*vs. leading period pads, 24 ml of fluid)​
UP TO ZERO LEAKS: These Poise pads deliver up to zero leaks and feature Leak-Block sides for outstanding dryness and protection​
ODOR CONTROL TECHNOLOGY: Each incontinence pad features Poise’s FreshSense system helps neutralize bladder leak odors for up to 12 hours
For all-night protection, try Poise Ultra Thin 8 Drop Overnight Incontinence Pads for Women​

product_description: Enjoy up to 100% clean, dry and fresh protection with our thinnest incontinence pad, Poise Ultra Thin Incontinence Pads. Unlike period pads, which are meant for menstrual needs, Poise pads are designed to offer protection specifically against light bladder leaks. In fact, Poise bladder control pads have a Dry-Touch layer that rapidly locks away more* wetness for a clean feel and offer up to zero leaks. Plus, our disposable incontinence pads feature Leak-Block sides for dryness and outstanding protection. As our thinnest protection, each incontinence pad has a Thin-Flex design that holds its shape for all-day comfort. These women’s pads are made with breathable materials that let fresh air in to help eliminate dampness and keep you feeling clean and fresh. Poise incontinence pads are available in Light, Moderate, Maximum and Overnight absorbencies. For lighter absorbency needs, check out Poise Daily Liners. Shop for Poise discreetly by having it shipped directly to your door or pick up curbside. Poise adult incontinence products are HSA/FSA-eligible in the US – check with your provider for coverage details. (*vs. leading period pads, 24 ml of fluid)

name: Chucks® MAX Hospital Bed Pads Disposable Adult 36 x 36 Breathable Incontinence Pads - XXX-Large Pee Pads for Adults - Heavy Duty 10X Absorbency Underpads - 400 Lbs. Patient Repositioning [20 Count]
short_description: MAXIMUM ABSORBENCY — Engineered with LeakLock Technology and advanced polymer bead fill, CHUCKS MAX underpads have an established clinical reputation in leading hospitals to absorb faster and hold up to 10X more liquid than standard bed pads — locking in moisture and controlling odor for all-night dryness. Designed for adults with incontinence, postpartum leaks, bedwetting, or post-surgery recovery, this XXXL 36" x 36" full-body coverage pad keeps skin dry and beds protected. Included 2 bags of 10 pads (20-count premium pack).

LEAKLOCK TECHNOLOGY — Each pad features five performance layers: (1) Soft non-woven top sheet for skin comfort (2) Fluff core for quiet, breathable cushioning (3) 145g Advanced+ polymer beads for rapid absorption (4) Tissue lining for even liquid distribution (5) Waterproof, tear-resistant backing for total leak and odor control. This combination, recognized in medical facilities worldwide, outperforms typical pharmacy-grade pads in both protection and comfort.

HOSPITAL-GRADE COMFORT — Crafted with a 100% plastic-free design, the ultra-soft fluff core and smooth, non-woven edges deliver breathable, quiet nighttime comfort with zero plastic crinkle. Trusted by hospitals and senior care centers, CHUCKS MAX ensures a peaceful, dignified rest and confidence for caregivers.

INDUSTRY-LEADING STRENGTH — Unlike flimsy underpads that rip or shift, CHUCKS MAX pads feature tear-resistant backing strong enough to reposition adults up to 400 lbs. Preferred in hospitals for post-surgery recovery and mobility-challenged care, with no tearing, bunching, or failures during transfers.

HYPOALLERGENIC AND SENSITIVE SKIN SAFE — Made without harsh chemicals, dyes, or salt-based irritants, CHUCKS MAX underpads are hypoallergenic and safe for long-term skin contact — perfect for elderly users, children, and individuals with skin sensitivity. Also versatile enough to protect guest beds or function as XL dog training pads for large breeds.

name: Always Discreet Boutique Incontinence Pads, for Bladder Leaks, Extra Heavy Absorbency, Long Length, 40 Count (2 Packs of 20)
short_description: ALWAYS DISCREET BOUTIQUE OFFERS INCREDIBLE PROTECTION with a fabric-like feel
MADE DIFFERENTLY: Hidden RapidDry core turns liquid to gel and locks it away
FLEXIBLE AND DISCREET DESIGN for a smooth fit under clothes
LEAKGUARDS HELPS STOP LEAKS at edges
NUMBER ONE COMBINATION OF PROTECTION AND SOFTNESS within the Always Discreet range
FIND THE RIGHT PAD SIZE FOR YOU using the Always Discreet My Fit size chart
POSTPARTUM AND BLADDER LEAK PADS available in bulk for added convenience and protection you deserve
INCONTINENCE PADS AND PANTILINERS FOR WOMEN are FSA and HSA eligible
product_description: Make worrying about bladder leaks a thing of past. With the Always Discreet Boutique line of adult incontinence pads for women, an overactive bladder won’t get in the way of feeling your best and living life to the fullest. Discover fashionable incontinence pads that fit your body and your lifestyle for protection you can count on and feel comfortable wearing. With Always Discreet Boutique Pads, you get incredible bladder leak protection that feels like your favorite underwear, thanks to the soft, fabric-like material that stays comfortably in place and fits discreetly under your clothing. The pads have a hidden RapidDry core that turns liquid to gel and locks away wetness, so you feel fresh, dry, and secure all day. Plus, side LeakGuards help keep wetness from reaching the edges, so you can leave any concerns about urinary incontinence behind. The chic and feminine pad designs from Always Discreet Boutique let you walk with poise and make bladder leaks no big deal. All you need to do is choose the size and absorbency level that's right for you. Always incontinence pads in smaller sizes work well for light leaks, while larger sizes with greater absorbencies provide more coverage for heavier leaks. Adult incontinence products from Always Discreet are HSA/FSA eligible, so check with your provider for plan coverage.

name: Chucks® Premium Disposable Underpads 30”x36” [100-Count] Ultra Absorbent Chux Incontinence Bed Pads Disposable Adult with Adhesive Tape, Pee Pads Pet Training Pads XX-Large 30x36 Bulk Pack
short_description: HOSPITAL-TRUSTED PROTECTION — The Curera Chucks brand is recognized worldwide by hospitals, nursing facilities, and caregivers for delivering reliable, hospital-grade underpads. Designed for peace of mind at home or in professional care, these XXL pads provide the highest standard of absorbency and comfort.

MAXIMUM ABSORBENCY WITH LEAKLOCK — Super absorbent polymer bead technology locks in liquids, reduces wetness, and neutralizes odors. Outperforms standard bed pads to keep sheets dry and protect skin during nighttime bedwetting or heavy incontinence.

5-LAYER LEAKLOCK TECHNOLOGY — (1) Non-woven skin-friendly top sheet feels soft and breathable, (2) moisture-retaining tissue layer locks in liquid quickly, (3) super absorbent polymer core delivers maximum absorbency by capturing and holding large amounts of fluid, (4) comfort fluff fill layer adds softness while distributing moisture evenly for a quiet and quality sleep, and (5) waterproof leakproof backing keeps bedding, mattresses, and furniture completely dry for a leak-free, odor-free night.

SECURE ADHESIVE STRIPS — Built-in adhesive strips keep each underpad firmly in place, preventing slips, bunching, or movement throughout the night — ideal for caregivers, elderly patients, or restless sleepers.

HYPOALLERGENIC & LATEX-FREE — Safe for sensitive skin with no irritating chemicals, salts, or dyes. Premium hypoallergenic materials provide confidence and comfort for adults, seniors, children, or pets

product_description: Give yourself the best nighttime protection* with Poise Overnight Incontinence & Postpartum Pads for Bladder Leaks with extra coverage. Unlike period pads, which are meant for menstrual needs, Poise pads are designed to offer protection against light bladder leaks. Poise Overnight Incontinence Pads and offer up to 100% clean, dry and fresh protection for worry-free nights. These disposable incontinence pads instantly absorb for up to zero odor and rapidly lock away more wetness than the leading period pad for amazing dryness. In fact, Poise incontinence pads for women are made with odor-reducing material and helps control odor for up to 12 hours. They also feature a 75% wider back** and a moisture-wicking top layer that is designed to feel dry throughout wear. Plus, each bladder leak pad has a ContourFit design, making it softly curved to help prevent bunching and has a wider front and back than in the middle to help keep you comfortably protected. Poise Postpartum Pads and Incontinence Pads are available in 3 Drop Light, 4 Drop Moderate, 5 Drop Maximum, 6 Drop Ultimate, 7 Drop Ultra, and 8 Drop Overnight absorbencies. Shop for Poise discreetly by having it shipped directly to your door or pick up curbside. Poise adult incontinence products are HSA/FSA-eligible in the US—check with your provider for coverage details. (*vs national brands pads) (**vs Poise Ultra Thin Ultimate Long)

product_description: Looking for dependable, strong, bladder leak protection that's barely noticeable under clothes? Experience incredible bladder leak and postpartum incontinence protection in a surprisingly thin and discreet incontinence pad. Always Discreet disposable Incontinence Pads for women provide the comfort you need with up to the 100% leak-free protection you deserve. Thanks to a unique absorbent core that keeps your skin dry by absorbing bladder leaks in seconds, you’ll be able to stay comfortable and feel fresh for hours. Walk with poise and confidence knowing two RapidDry layers form a boosted protection zone in the center of the pad that holds up to 5x the average leak, giving you extra bladder control protection where you need it most. The LeakGuards help keep wetness away from the sides and prevent run-offs at the edges where unexpected leaks tend to occur, while the lightly scented OdorLock technology neutralizes odors instantly and continuously. Don’t let bladder leaks get in the way of your day. Simply find your right size with the Always Discreet My Fit chart and get the bladder control pads for women with protection you can depend on. Always Discreet Incontinence Pads are available in bulk for added convenience and come in a complete range of absorbencies and lengths.
